amendment.description: Amendment sought to require States to implement the June 30, 1983 Office of Surface Mining Reclamation and Enforcement stream buffer zone rule, unless a State has a program with greater stream protection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 231 (Roll no. 138).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 231 (Roll no. 138).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Lowenthal.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
